zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackgroundPattern, LocalPattern, RainbowPattern

    public abstract class Pattern
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the interface between the LEDCloud and all possible patterns, for the LEDCloud to have a way of accessing the patterns' current pictures and sending them to the led-strip.
    Author:
    Zyklone

    • Method Detail

      • getNextPicture

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color>> getNextPicture()
        Returns:
        the patterns latest picture, or null if the picture is unable to produce any more pictures (e.g. if pattern-lifetime is reached)

      • initializePicture

        protected void initializePicture()
        Initializes the picture by creating the required lists and setting all the picture's pixels to black (i.e. dark).
